00020 using namespace std;

00022 namespace jma
00023 {
00024 bool POSTable::loadConfig(const char* fileName)
00025 {
00026     assert(fileName);
00027 
00028     // remove the previous table if exists
00029     posAlphabetTable_.clear();
00030 
00031     // open file
00032     ifstream from(fileName);
00033     if(! from)
00034     {
00035         return false;
00036     }
00037 
00038     // read file
00039     string line, japanesePOS, alphabetPOS;
00040     string::size_type i, j;
00041     const char* whitespaces = " \t";
00042 
00043     // to convert from index string to int value
00044     istringstream iss;
00045     int indexValue;
00046 
00047 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00048     cout << "load POS table: " << fileName << endl;
00049     cout << "JapanesePOS\tindex\tAlphabet" << endl;
00050 #endif
00051 
00052     // each line is assumed in the format "JapanesePOS index AlphabetPOS",
00053     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00054     while(getline(from, line))
00055     {
00056         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00057 
00058         if(line.empty())
00059             continue;
00060 
00061         // set JapanesePOS
00062         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces);
00063         if(j == string::npos)
00064             continue;
00065         japanesePOS = line.substr(0, j);
00066 
00067         // set index
00068         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00069         if(i == string::npos)
00070             continue;
00071         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00072         if(j == string::npos)
00073             continue;
00074         iss.clear();
00075         iss.str(line.substr(i, j-i));
00076         iss >> indexValue;
00077 
00078         // set alphabetPOS
00079         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00080         if(i == string::npos)
00081             continue;
00082         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00083         if(j == string::npos)
00084         {
00085             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i);
00086         }
00087         else
00088         {
00089             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i, j-i);
00090         }
00091 
00092 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00093         cout << japanesePOS << "\t" << indexValue << "\t" << alphabetPOS << endl;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096         if(indexValue < 0)
00097         {
00098             cerr << "the index code of POS (" << japanesePOS << ", " << alphabetPOS << ") should not be a negative value: " << indexValue << endl;
00099             continue;
00100         }
00101 
00102         if(static_cast<unsigned int>(indexValue) >= posAlphabetTable_.size())
00103         {
00104             posAlphabetTable_.resize(indexValue+1);
00105         }
00106         posAlphabetTable_[indexValue] = alphabetPOS;
00107     }
00108 
00109 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00110     cout << endl;
00111 #endif
00112 
00113     return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 const char* POSTable::getAlphabetPOS(int index) const
00117 {
00118     if(index < 0 || static_cast<unsigned int>(index) >= posAlphabetTable_.size())
00119         return "";
00120 
00121     return posAlphabetTable_[index].c_str();
00122 }
